entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump tRump has no basis in fact to declare that the US economy will be stronger than ever after the Coronavirus pandemic passes.  It has been determined that many businesses both big and small will go under!
